 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָבַר‎</span><sub>132</sub> **verb** ==bury== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קבר‎</span>, ***bury***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קבר‎</span> ***tomb***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***‡ibiru***</u></abbr>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְבַר‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קבר‎</span>, all ***bury***; Palmyrene Nabataean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קברא‎</span> ***tomb***, so Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קבר‎</span> [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chrest. 126</sup>, Lihyanian <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קבר‎</span> ***bury***, [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Epigr. Denkm. No, 35, 2, 3</sup>, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מקבר(הםׅ‎</span> ***burial- place*** [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv,No, 20,1.2,4</sup>); — 

**Qal**<sub>86</sub> ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ק‎</span> [[Gen.23.19|Gen 23:19]] 2 masculine singular Sf. consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּקְבַרְתַּנְי‎</span> [[Gen.47.30|Gen 47:30]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּקְבֹּד‎</span> [[Deut.34.6|Deut 34:6]]; [[2Kgs.21.26|2Kgs 21:26]], etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְבֹר‎</span> [[Gen.23.6|Gen 23:6]] +, etc.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָבוֺר‎</span> [[Deut.21.23|Deut 21:23]] ***construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִקְכּוֺר‎</span> [[Jer.19.11|Jer 19:11]] +, etc.; ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֹבֵר‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.10|2Kgs 9:10]] +, etc.; ***pass***. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָבוּר‎</span> [[1Kgs.13.31|1Kgs 13:31]], plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְבֻרִים‎</span> [[Eccl.8.10|Eccl 8:10]] ***bury***, acc. person, bones, etc., usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location, [[2Sam.2.32|2Sam 2:32]]; [[1Kgs.13.31|1Kgs 13:31]] (twice in verse); [[Gen.23.6|Gen 23:6]]; [[Josh.24.30|Josh 24:30]]; [[Josh.24.32|Josh 24:32]] (twice in verse); [[Judg.2.9|Judg 2:9]] + 33 t.; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּיתוֺ‎</span> location [[2Chr.33.20|2Chr 33:20]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּגַןבֵּֿיתוֺ‎</span> \|\| [[2Kgs.21.18|2Kgs 21:18]], also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּבֵיתוֺ‎</span> [[1Sam.25.1|1Sam 25:1]]; [[1Kgs.2.34|1Kgs 2:34]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span> [[Num.11.34|Num 11:34]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת‎</span> [[1Sam.31.13|1Sam 31:13]] = [[1Chr.10.12|1Chr 10:12]] pregnantly with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location [[Gen.23.19|Gen 23:19]]; [[Gen.25.9|Gen 25:9]]; [[Ezek.39.15|Ezek 39:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלאֲֿבֹתָ֑י‎</span> [[Gen.49.29|Gen 49:29]] compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִםאֲֿבוֺתָיו‎</span> [[2Kgs.12.22|2Kgs 12:22]]; [[2Kgs.15.7|2Kgs 15:7]]; [[2Chr.25.28|2Chr 25:28]]; [[2Chr.26.23|2Chr 26:23]] (see also **Niph\`al**, and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תָּבוֺא אֶלֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲבֹתֶיךָ‎</span> [[Gen.15.15|Gen 15:15]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֫תָּה‎</span> [[Gen.23.13|Gen 23:13]]; [[Gen.49.31|Gen 49:31]] (3 t. in verse); [[Gen.50.5|Gen 50:5]] with accusative of person Alone [[2Sam.2.4|2Sam 2:4]]; [[2Sam.2.5|2Sam 2:5]] + 22 t.; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְּפָנַי‎</span> [[Gen.23.4|Gen 23:4]]; [[Gen.23.8|Gen 23:8]] passive [[Eccl.8.10|Eccl 8:10]] accusative omitted [[2Kgs.9.10|2Kgs 9:10]] + 3 t. + (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) [[2Sam.4.12|2Sam 4:12]]. **Niph\`al**<sub>30</sub> ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקָּבֵר‎</span> [[Jer.22.19|Jer 22:19]], etc.; — ***be buried*** [[Gen.15.15|Gen 15:15]]Jer [[Gen.8.2|Gen 8:2]]; [[Gen.16.4|Gen 16:4]]; [[Gen.16.5|Gen 16:5]]; [[Gen.25.33|Gen 25:33]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אסף‎</span>), so read perhaps [[Ezek.29.5|Ezek 29:5]] for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקָּבֵץ‎</span> (+ ***id.***); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קְבֻרַת חֲמוֺר יִקּ‎</span> [[Jer.22.19|Jer 22:19]] usually with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location [[Gen.35.19|Gen 35:19]]; [[Judg.8.32|Judg 8:32]] + 6 t. Judges; [[2Sam.17.23|2Sam 17:23]]; [[1Kgs.2.10|1Kgs 2:10]]; [[1Kgs.2.34|1Kgs 2:34]] + 16 t. Kings Chronicles (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִםאֲֿבוֺתָיו‎</span> [[1Kgs.14.31|1Kgs 14:31]]; [[1Kgs.15.24|1Kgs 15:24]] 6 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִםמַֿלְכֵי יִשְׂר‎</span> [[2Kgs.13.13|2Kgs 13:13]]; [[2Kgs.14.16|2Kgs 14:16]]); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁם‎</span> [[Num.20.1|Num 20:1]] + 3 t.; with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּחַת‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתַּחַת‎</span> [[Gen.35.8|Gen 35:8]]. **Pi\`el** ***bury*** (in masses), with accusative: ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּקַכְּרֵם‎</span> [[Hos.9.6|Hos 9:6]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְקַבֵּר‎</span> [[1Kgs.11.15|1Kgs 11:15]] ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקַכְּרִים‎</span> [[Num.33.4|Num 33:4]]; [[Ezek.39.14|Ezek 39:14]] as intensive noun, of office, ***burier***, singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְקַכֵּר‎</span> [[Jer.14.16|Jer 14:16]], plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמּ‎</span> [[Ezek.39.15|Ezek 39:15]]. **Pu\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֫מָּה קֻבַּר אַבְרָהָם‎</span> [[Gen.25.10|Gen 25:10]].
